pr_title: Separate out the parquet prune and transform logic

timeline.message: Fix README when initializing default server config

Separate out the parquet prune and transform logic

The ParquetOperatorPrunerAndTransformer functionality is overloaded. We
would like to extract out the Prune and Transform functionalities into
their own classes to separate out functionality and for a cleaner
implementation.

timeline.bodyText: will this almost always be 0 as we unlikely will reach 1tuple/ns speed and the variable is not float. Why not measure in tuples / ms units ?
